column6: "GOLGOTHA" Part 4 (of 5) The strange madness the X-Men discovered in Antarctica has come to the X-Mansion. Are the X-Men prepared to face what's inside them...or will they be defeated by their own inner demons?
column8: | colorist:Liquid Graphics | penciller (cover):Salvador Larroca | inker:Danny K. Miki | writer:Peter Milligan | letterer:Cory Petit
